definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

pinyin: yuan2 zi3 bao4 po4 dan4 yao4

definition: blaster/soldier or workman who sets off explosive charges/petardier

sentences.english: The results are appliable for design of nonel circuit.
sentences.chinese: 这些研究成果对非电爆破网络设计十分有用。

sentences.english: For that reason, the explosives unit maintains a huge supply of potential bomb making ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爆破小组保存了许多可能制造炸弹的材料。

sentences.english: A ferocious blast (ff) starts off the reprise.
sentences.chinese: 重奏在一记爆破般的响声中开始。

sentences.english: In the beautiful clouds, the world's current blasting milk.
sentences.chinese: 在美女如云，世界上现有的爆破牛奶。

sentences.english: Helo one burst into flames while the demolition team boarded the Chinook.
sentences.chinese: 1号机化为了一团火焰的同时爆破组登上了支奴干。

sentences.english: Two big gate constructions were demolished by use of directional controlled blasting.
sentences.chinese: 采用定向控制爆破方法拆除两座大门楼。

sentences.english: In order to prevent the artificial open fuse blasting caused the injury accident, the blasting technique was improved.
sentences.chinese: 为防止人工明火放炮对人身伤害，改进了爆破技术。

sentences.english: Two tyres burst on left main landing gear.

sentences.chinese: 爆破发生24小时内的每一天。

sentences.english: The problems in the blasting of the short terrace tunneling in Shijianling Tunnel are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了石宽岭隧道短台阶掘进爆破施工中存在的问题。

sentences.english: Drillers and blasters often perform both drilling and blasting activities.
sentences.chinese: 钻井工人和爆破手经常进行钻探及爆破活动。

sentences.english: Drillers and blasters often perform both drilling and blasting activities.
sentences.chinese: 钻井工人和爆破手经常进行钻探及爆破活动。

sentences.english: The results of the blasting safety accident of a certain mine in Shaanxi were described.
sentences.chinese: 简述了陕西省某矿区爆破飞石伤人事故的分析结果。

sentences.english: Drilling-and-blasting operations is the most spectacular part of the extraction process.
sentences.chinese: 钻孔爆破作业是采掘过程中最惊人的。

sentences.english: The paper has certain refernce value for actual application of blasting excavation of rock in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文对岩石爆破开挖的实际应用具有一定价值。

sentences.english: In this paper, the demolition of an office building with controlled blasting is briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了原北京带钢厂办公楼的控制爆破拆除。

definition: to explode/spontaneous detonation/self-detonation/suicide bombing/to disclose private matters about oneself
to explode/to set off an explosion/to detonate

to blow up/to destroy with explosives
